Label.text: Come behind the bar and craft your own coffee

ScrollView.Label: Ever wanted to jump behind the bar and craft your own coffee? Creamy, Iced, Frothy... Come to Harris + Hoole and we'll let you. We will give you a quick tour of the coffee machine we use and will teach you how to create your favourite beverage.
9 The Broadway, Crouch End N8 8DU
